## Summary

This is the R demo for the TDWG conference. 

## Demo

`rdf4jr` library for communication with the GraphDB server.
`obkms` the OBKMS library for RDF-ization and query.

```{r , purl=TRUE, eval = FALSE}
library(obkms)
library(rdf4jr)
example = "10.3897_BDJ.4.e8030.xml"
demo_folder = "/media/viktor/www2/main/vsenderov.backup/SRC/TaxPub2RDF/demo/"
configuration_file = "/media/viktor/www2/main/vsenderov.backup/SRC/TaxPub2RDF/etc/config.yml"
sao = yaml::yaml.load_file( configuration_file )
sao$userpwd = Sys.getenv("OBKMS_SECRET")
init_env(sao)
turtle = xml2rdf( paste0(demo_folder, example ) )
writeLines (  turtle, paste0( demo_folder, "example.ttl" ) )
find_related_names("Harmonia manillana")
```
